name: BOOM (itch) (B'rⵙⵙt)
description:
Boom is a 2d arcade game 

There are bombs which like to collide each other your job is to swipe them away from each other if the collide you lose 

It's very difficult to complete. It only have 3 levels though. 

Let's see who can beat this  

                    Enjoy-

Compatible:-this game work seamlessly in android (5 &6)  Later android versions can run this but there will some bugs in screen resolution other wise it is very fluent 

Note:- this is my first ever game so there is so much          bugs  -sorry for all bugs-
